T02D1451:356a-1: ldan 'das 'jam dpal rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1451:356a-6: y'a dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1451:356a-12: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang /
T02D1451:356a-13: a'a li dang k'a li ni g-yon dang g-yas dag tu'o //
T02D1451:356a-14: a'a a'i a'u aee aoo aam aa: ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha rnams dang /
T02D1451:356a-16: aom tr'am dzr'im kham h'um lam mam pam h'um chos kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1451:356a-17: aom a'a a'i a'u aee longs spyod kyi 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1451:356a-18: ham bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la'o //
T02D1451:356a-19: mchog tu srung ba ni ye ge ksha'o //
T02D1451:356a-20: zla ba dang nyi ma dag ni 'og dang steng gi sgo gnyis so /
T02D1451:356a-21: gnad 'byed pa dang gser gyi sgo ste 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'o //
T02D1451:356a-22: rnal 'byor bzhi ni myur ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-30: ting nge 'dzin gsum ni dang po sbyor ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-33: las gsum ni spyan drang ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-34: gshegs su gsol ba dang bzhugs pa'o //
T02D1451:356a-35: yan lag bzhi ni bsnyen pa dang /
T02D1451:356a-44: sde pa bzhi ni gnas brtan pa dang /
T02D1451:356a-45: thams cad yod par smra ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-48: dbye ba bzhi ni chung du dang /
T02D1451:356a-52: skad cig ma bzhi ni rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang /
T02D1451:356a-56: dga' ba bzhi ni dga' ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-58: khyad par gyi dga' ba dang /
T02D1451:356a-59: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o //
T02D1451:356a-60: 'bras bu bzhi ni rgyu mthun pa dang /
T02D1451:356a-64: bzang po bzhi ni bdag gi bzang po dang /
T02D1451:356b-3: de kho na nyid kyi gdan no //
T02D1451:356b-4: de kho na nyid bzhi ni sngags kyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1451:356b-5: lha'i de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1451:356b-6: dkyil 'khor gyi de kho na nyid dang /
T02D1451:356b-7: ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do //
T02D1451:356b-12: shes rab gnyis ni dmigs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-14: dmigs pa dang bcas pa ni t'a tha'i dbugs dbyung ba ste 'khor ba'o //
T02D1451:356b-15: dmigs pa med pa ni rdo rje 'chang gi dbugs dbyung ste mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T02D1451:356b-19: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga ni /
T02D1451:356b-25: phung po lnga ni gzugs dang /
T02D1451:356b-30: ye shes lnga ni me long lta bu dang /
T02D1451:356b-34: chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1451:356b-35: lha mo bzhi ni spyan ma dang /
T02D1451:356b-43: byang chub sems dpa' drug ni sa'i snying po dang /
T02D1451:356b-47: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
T02D1451:356b-49: dbang po drug ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po'o //
T02D1451:356b-50: chu tshod ni sum cu rtsa gnyis so //
T02D1451:356b-51: dbyu gu ni drug cu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1451:356b-54: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu ni /
T02D1451:356b-55: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-56: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-57: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-58: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-59: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-60: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T02D1451:356b-65: 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'o //
T02D1451:357a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu ye shes kyi gnas skabs kyi sa rnams so //
T02D1451:357a-21: yul nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbye ba tha dad de /
T02D1451:357a-22: pull'i ra ma la ya dang /
T02D1451:357a-29: m'a la wi ni nye ba'i gnas so //
T02D1451:357a-30: k'a ma r'u pa dang ao te ni zhing nge //
T02D1451:357a-32: ko sal ni nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02D1451:357a-34: lam b'a ka ni tshando ha'o //
T02D1451:357a-36: hi m'a la ya ni nye ba'i tshando ha'o //
T02D1451:357a-38: gri ha de ba t'a ni 'dus sa'o //
T02D1451:357a-40: su warna dv'i pa ni nye ba'i 'dus sa'o //
T02D1451:357a-41: na ga ra dang sindhu ni dur khrod do //
T02D1451:357a-42: ma ru dang ku lu t'a ni nye ba'i dur khrod de //
T02D1451:357a-43: 'dir rim pa ji lta bar mgo dang /
T02D1451:357a-64: rkang pa gnyis kyi bol dang /
T02D1451:357a-67: pull'i ra ma la yar dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357a-68: dz'a landha rar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357a-69: ao di ya na du 'jug go //
T02D1451:357a-70: dz'a landha rar dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357a-71: ao di yan du longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357a-73: ao di yan du dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357a-77: go d'a ba rir longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357a-79: go d'a ba rir dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357a-80: r'a me shva rir longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357a-82: r'a me shva rir dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357a-83: de w'i ko tir longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357a-85: de w'i ko tir dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-0: m'a la war longs @357b spyod de //
T02D1451:357b-2: m'a la war dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-3: k'a ma r'u par longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-5: k'a mar'u par dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-9: tri sha ku ner longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-11: tri sha ku ner dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-12: ko sa lar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-14: ko sa lar dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-24: hi m'a la yar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-25: yi dags lhag gnas su 'jug go //
T02D1451:357b-26: hi m'a la yar dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-27: gri ha de ba t'ar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-28: yi dags lhag gnas su 'jug go //
T02D1451:357b-29: yi dags lhag gnas su dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-30: gri ha de ba t'ar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-32: gri ha de ba t'ar dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-36: soo warna dv'i par longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-38: su warna dv'i par dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-45: ma ru'i yul du longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-47: ma ru'i yul du dbang byed do //
T02D1451:357b-48: ku lu tar longs spyod do //
T02D1451:357b-49: yan lag thams cad la 'jug go //
T02D1451:357b-50: gnas 'di dag thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1451:357b-51: rnams kyi bde ba chen po'i ye shes ji ltar
T02D1451:357b-52: bde bar rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos
T02D1451:357b-53: dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku'i rang
T02D1451:357b-54: bzhin skye zhing gnas la 'jug pa'o //
T02D1451:357b-55: 'di rnams gtso bo ji lta bar ao da yan
T02D1451:357b-56: dang gnad 'byed pa'i sgo nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1451:357b-57: ma bskul zhing dz'a landha rar ni bde ba chen
T02D1451:357b-59: phyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos rnams sdud pa'o //
T02D1451:357b-60: 'di nyid la dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg dang mchod
T02D1451:357b-61: sbyin dang bsam gtan dang bsgom bya dang gzugs dang
T02D1451:358a-1: ba la sogs par rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1451:358a-3: // bsrub bya srub byed yang dag par sbyor bas
T02D1451:358a-4: ye shes kyi me las kyi rlung gis sbar te
T02D1451:358a-5: lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du du ba 'thul ba dang
T02D1451:358a-6: 'bar ba dang gnas pa dang gsal ba dag gi
T02D1451:358a-7: dam tshig gi 'khor lor son pa'i bdag gi de
T02D1451:358a-8: bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsregs pas longs spyod kyi 'khor
T02D1451:358a-9: lor chud pa'i thabs la bskor bar bya ste /
T02D1451:358a-10: mdzod spur song nas gnad 'byed pa'i sgo ao da
T02D1451:358a-11: ya na gyi ming can byung nas 'jig rten gyi
T02D1451:358a-12: khams rnams su son pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
T02D1451:358a-13: kyi thugs kar bsdus te spyi gtsug gi bu gnas
T02D1451:358a-14: son nas gser sgo dz'a landha r'i'a ming can nas
T02D1451:358a-15: zhugs te / snga ma ltar dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsreg go //
T02D1451:358a-16: 'byung ba dang 'jug pa ni mi mthong ste /
T02D1451:358a-17: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi cha'i tshad kyi phyir ro zhes bya'o //
T02D1451:358a-20: // / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs
T02D1451:358a-21: kar phyin pa'i dam tshig gi 'khor lo bsdus te
T02D1451:358a-22: / chos dbyings ye shes kyi bdud rtsi blangs nas
T02D1451:358a-23: sngar bstan pa'i sgo nas byung ste 'o ma'i rgyun
T02D1451:358a-24: ltar 'ongs nas sgo de nyid nas zhugs te mtshams
T02D1451:358a-25: kyi nang du son pa'i bu gnas longs spyod kyi
T02D1451:358a-26: 'khor lo rang la bso te bsregs pa'i de bzhin
T02D1451:358a-27: gshegs pa dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du song pa
T02D1451:358a-28: rnams la dga' ba bskyed nas lte ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1451:358a-30: 'dir yang 'byung ba dang 'gro ba dang 'ong ba yang mi mthong ste /
T02D1451:358a-31: skra'i rtse mo brgya stong gi tshad kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya'o //
T02D1451:358a-34: // / da ni rgyud dang sngags dang ye shes spangs
T02D1451:358a-35: pa sgo gnyis 'gro 'ong las rnam par grol ba
T02D1451:358a-36: phung po dang khams dang skye mched dang bral ba
T02D1451:358a-37: / yul rnams las nges par log pa /
T02D1451:358a-38: mun nag stug po la dor bu chu shel ltar
T02D1451:358a-39: 'od gsal ba rdul dang bral ba stong pa'i mchog
T02D1451:358a-40: / mtshan ma med cing smon pa med ba'i ye
T02D1451:358a-41: shes / rang gzhan rig pa dang bral ba /
T02D1451:358a-44: mar la mar bzhag pa ltar mya ngan las 'das pa /
T02D1451:358a-45: bdag med pa'i byang chub kyi sems te /
T02D1451:358a-46: btsun mo'i bha ga la ni bde ba can gyi ming can la'o //
T02D1451:358b-0: bzhugs @358b so ni gnas dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-1: thams cad kyang yin la de bzhin gshegs pa yang
T02D1451:358b-2: yin pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phung
T02D1451:358b-4: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs aom a'a: h'um zhes pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
T02D1451:358b-5: de rnams kyi rdo rje ni byang chub kyi sems rnams so //
T02D1451:358b-6: bzhugs so ni gnas dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-7: de rnams kyi btsun mo ni mi la sogs pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-8: de'i bha ga de la zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1451:358b-10: ae'i cha byad bzang po gang //
T02D1451:358b-11: dbus su bam gyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1451:358b-12: bde ba kun gyi gnas yin te //
T02D1451:358b-13: sangs rgyas rin chen zam tog / de yi sprul pa'i sku bdag gis //
T02D1451:358b-14: longs spyod rdzogs de thos pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-15: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
T02D1451:358b-16: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i btsun mo'i bha ga
T02D1451:358b-17: la bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' da ltar
T02D1451:358b-18: yang bzhugs pa'o // dus gcig na zhes bya ba
T02D1451:358b-19: lan cig gi tshe de'i dus gcig na ste 'bog
T02D1451:358b-20: pa'i dus dang dpyid kyi dus zhes bya ba ste
T02D1451:358b-21: yang bzhugs pa'o // / ji srid du g-yas dang
T02D1451:358b-22: g-yon pa'i rlung sna sbubs su son pa'i rlung 'gog
T02D1451:358b-23: pa na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1451:358b-24: chos gang rgyu las byung dang rgyu de dag / de bzhin gshegs pa yis ni gsungs pa ste /
T02D1451:358b-25: de dag la ni 'gog pa gang yin pa //
T02D1451:358b-26: dge sbyor chen po yis ni 'di skad gsungs //
T02D1451:358b-27: srid pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag / ngo bo nyid kyis srid dral byas //
T02D1451:358b-28: da ltar byung ba'i rang bzhin las //
T02D1451:358b-29: 'da' bar dka' bar byas pa'i phyir //
T02D1451:358b-33: // / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab chos kyi phung
T02D1451:358b-34: po brgyad khri bzhi stong las bstan pa'i rim pa
T02D1451:358b-35: bzhi po'i don 'di ni spyod pa'i brtul zhugs pa
T02D1451:358b-36: slob dpon nag pos mdzad pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-37: rim pa bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T02D1451:358b-39: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal sum ti k'irti'i zhal snga nas dang /
T02D1451:358b-40: dge slong grags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur te /
T02D1451:358b-41: yul dbus kyi dpe dang gtugs pa'o //
T02D1451:358b-42: gang phyir dam pa rnams kyi thugs //
T02D1451:358b-43: ston ka'i zla 'od dang mtshungs pas //
T02D1451:358b-44: bdag gis nyes par snang na yang //
